pr_title: Mobile: fix side-menu width on tablet devices
pr_body:
### Summary
This pull request fixes the issue of the side-menu becoming too wide on devices with wider screens like tablet devices. It's a part of the [Tablet Layout Project](https://discourse.joplinapp.org/t/joplin-mobile-tablet-layout/25775)
